body_text: FWIW, I can see arguments both ways and don't really mind either way, so approved the PR. I'm also painfully aware that small changes like this sometimes get more scrutiny than much bigger ones, because humans, and that's not necessarily justified - so carry on! (see also: the now possibly-slightly-cult-ified bikeshed v. nuclear reactor example from Parkinson's law of triviality)
